question: 紫色
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>purple</kanji> <kanji>color</kanji> is a <vocabulary>violet</vocabulary> color, mainly, for some reason, though I'll let "purple" slide as well.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading for <ja>紫</ja> is different from the one you learned with the kanji. To remember this reading, think about how the previous village you went to was all purple. It was the "<ja><reading>村先</reading></ja>" (<ja>むらさき</ja>) that you went to. Everything. Absolutely everything was purple.
